Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Lithikumases don't belong in Faeglen. It upsets the fae when they squash the nice-looking shrubbery.

Bring down {@LinkCreature:54#260#feytouched lithikumases} in western Faeglen.

Upon mission completion, report to Lashada of Arcanum Outpost.
A difficult mission to be sure. Congratulations for completing it successfully. Now Seeliewood can return to its former glory.

Feytouched lithikumases are extremely dangerous. Please be careful.

Once you've completed your mission, see me for a reward.
